title: Pixel 3 XL won't turn on. "Can't find valid operating system".
content:
My Pixel 3 XL won't turn on. I get an error message that reads:

"Can't find valid operating system. The device will not start. 
Visit this link on another device:
g.co/ABH

ID: 61FDA12B"

If I hold the power button and volume down I get the following options: "Start, Power Off, Barcode, Recovery Mode and Restart Bootloader". They all lead me to the same error screen that I started with. 

I have not changed the operating system myself or done anything that could explain this bug. 
The device was bought in November and I recieved this error recently.

I'd prefer trying to fix the phone with your help before shipping it for repairs/replacement.

Regards,
Stefán Ingi Árnason
